name: Outlaw Tales
description:
Welcome to Outlaw Tales.
You are about to start your story as an outlaw . Is up to you to choose the typee of live you want to live.
-Want to be the most wanted outlaw?
In Outlaw you can!,you can be the most dishonered, join a gang, shoot outlaws from the back before they challenge to a duel, steal an old man that only needs help…
-Do you prefer to help the sheriff?
You can help the sheriff.
theres lots of characters that need your help.
Be a outlaw of example!
-¿Want have fun and search who is the first in ranking?
Thats how it works Outlaw Tales. The events had a unique humor that you will love.
Enjoy finding out what is behind every answered, you won´t regreted, or, investigated and try to get to the end of each storie. There are suprises that only the more intelligent will uncover.

Don´t forguet that you are competing against other outlaws, the outlaw who gets more far in the distant the best position will earn in the rankings and you will earn future rewards.

Caracteristics:
Multiplayer
More than 50 events to resolve
Big map of 3 km, a 10-15 minutes of map
Duels betwen players, You will challenge other players
Justice movile. The sheriff and his partners control the old west searching for the badest outlaw.
